close_to_me.content: Frontend Developer specialized in React JS and Next.js, focused on scalable interfaces, interactive animations, and modular architecture. Fullstack experience with Java (Spring Boot) and headless CMS, leading projects with performance, accessibility, and CI/CD automation.
